title: Lemon and orange Chinese-style beef

default: knob fresh ginger, peeled and sliced
3 lemon leaves, shredded (or subsitute lime leaves)

steps: Heat the oil in a small wok over a high heat, until smoking, and add the ginger and beef. Stir fry for two minutes, to brown.
Turn the heat down slightly, add the remaining ingredients and stir fry for a further two minutes before transferring to a bowl and serving.
